project.name: J-C606A-LUCE-04-ST02-DT03-DF06-CF03-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.

iopair.name: J-C606A-LUCE-04-ST02-DT03-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_eMsN710JMP5yFfBFMvsM AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_q7r136ciwB OR (NOT (finished_0sbBWEHt2K AND finished_4aHgeKIce8) AND NOT (controlled_exit_wABvaF2P5v OR continued_execution_uEIgIOYt0Q)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_q7r136ciwB OR (NOT (finished_0sbBWEHt2K AND finished_4aHgeKIce8) AND NOT (controlled_exit_wABvaF2P5v OR continued_execution_uEIgIOYt0Q))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_q7r136ciwB OR (NOT (finished_0sbBWEHt2K AND finished_4aHgeKIce8) AND NOT (controlled_exit_wABvaF2P5v OR continued_execution_uEIgIOYt0Q)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_q7r136ciwB OR (NOT (finished_0sbBWEHt2K AND finished_4aHgeKIce8) AND NOT (controlled_exit_wABvaF2P5v OR continued_execution_uEIgIOYt0Q)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
